<dannyryan> re this issue: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3109

If we are going to tightly couple the range and byroot requests, then we can acutally just remove beacon_slot and beacon_root from the sidecar and thus remove the conditions related to (1) and (2)

Any strong feelings here? We are cutting a release tomorrow so we can either
1. do nothing (these conditions are fine for non-adversarial testnets as is)
2. do the fixes from the issue
3. remove root and slot from sidecar

Will default to (1) unless there is a particular reason to rush in (2) or (3) before the release
